basics.name: Julio Zeledón
basics.label: Full-Stack  Web Engineer
basics.summary: Hands-on frontend leader with 10+ years building and scaling React/Next.js applications. Experienced in driving frontend architecture, performance, accessibility, and SEO across teams. Strong mentorship track record and cross-functional collaboration with product and design. Skilled in GraphQL/REST, Contentful, NestJS, CI/CD, testing strategy, and platform modernization.

experience.summary: Defined and executed technology strategy, architected e-commerce platform, integrated ERP, implemented DevOps, and mentored teams.
highlights: Architected e-commerce platform with Next.js (v13 App Router), Apollo Client, Contentful CMS.
Integrated Odoo ERP for inventory synchronization.
Experimented with AI Agents to improve customer service.
Implemented CI/CD with GitHub Actions, Netlify, Vercel, Docker.
Managed MongoDB/Postgres, automated backups, DNS/SSL, MFA access.
Mentored engineers, trained users, and prioritized backlog with Agile.

experience.summary: Modernized LightEdge portal dashboard with React improvements, testing, and Agile practices.
highlights: Migrated and modernized LightEdge dashboard.
Refactored legacy React into atomic components.
Optimized API fetching and created custom hooks.
Standardized coding with TypeScript/React best practices.
Implemented unit testing with TDD and OpenAI Codex.
Integrated Material UI for consistency.

experience.summary: Led fullstack development for dashboards and telehealth solutions with React, Node, and Vonage API.
highlights: Developed dashboards for Very Good Security with React/Node/Redux.
Built telehealth platform for DaVita with Vonage API and mobile app views.
Implemented E2E testing with TestCafe and Jest.
Mentored juniors, conducted interviews, and collaborated with design teams.
Integrated Rollbar and Mixpanel for stability and monitoring.

experience.summary: Developed React and Angular apps, PoCs for Microsoft Azure, and introduced TDD practices.
highlights: Built PoCs for Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services.
Delivered Angular and React projects integrated with .NET/Node.js.
Introduced TDD practices with React Testing Library, Jest, Enzyme.
Optimized APIs and performance.

experience.summary: Delivered digital marketing sites, animations, and CMS projects.
highlights: Built landing pages and responsive email templates.
Implemented GSAP animations for interactivity.
Maintained WordPress/Drupal sites and AngularJS portfolio.
Developed first React-based dynamic forms.

experience.summary: Fullstack development with MEAN stack, booking and monitoring systems.
highlights: Built MEAN stack booking platform for Costa Rica Monkey Tours.
Developed radio/TV monitoring system for large-scale data.
Improved security with encryption.

experience.summary: Provided IT support for Active Directory, hardware, software, and networks.
highlights: Managed Active Directory accounts and access policies.
Performed hardware diagnostics and repairs.
Supported Microsoft Office, Outlook, ERP, VPNs.
Configured switches, APs, VLANs, IPs.
Managed backups and data recovery.
